charges.charge_description: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the BOP for a term of 84 months as to Count 1 and 60 months as to Count 2 of the Indictment to run consecutively, followed by Supervised Release term of 5 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently. Standard/Special conditions imposed. Costs/Fines Waived. MPA-$200. The Court recommends that the defendant be designated to Sandstone FCI. The Court also recommends that the defendant be designated for participation in RDAP program. Counts 3 and 4 are dismissed upon Government's motion. Defendant advised of right to appeal. Defendant is remanded to the custody of USM.
